name: df-frgp
body: |- wceq(cfrgp, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cfv(cfrmd, cxp(cv(s0), c2o)), cqus, cfv(cefg, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the free group on a set ` I ` of generators, defined as the quotient of the free monoid on ` I X. 2o ` (representing the generator elements and their formal inverses) by the free group equivalence relation ~ df-efg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
